Configure the Project

Configure the Project

Configuration settings are in ValidateService/src/main/resources/config.properties file.

LDAP provider properties

adProviderUrl is the url to LDAP server. Current setting is "adldap", directs to LDAP controller that dynamically assigns a working LDAP server.

adProviderSocket is the socket number of the LDAP server. Current setting is "389", an open socket accepting requests. "636" is the secure socket which requires certificate.

Parent folder in SVN

repoFolders stores the SVN paths to directories in which the application should look for .xsd schema files. Each path needs to be in the format of svn+ssh://{path to directory}, and separated by comma without space.

Quartz CronTrigger

quarts stores the Quarts expression that states how often the application is to search SVN for schema files and clear all previously exported schema files.

Building the Project

This is a maven project. The war file at ValidateService/target/ValidateService.war is ready for deployment in Tomcat. Any future changes to source code will require rebuilding the project. Assuming maven is already installed on the system, navigate to project directory and run "mvn clean install".

Deploying the Project in Tomcat

Copy ValidateService/target/ValidateService.war file to tomcat/webapps directory and start tomcat.
